channel.title: CVE Feed for unspecified -- iPXE
channel.description: The latest CVEs for unspecified -- iPXE

item.title: CVE-2022-4087|2024-08-03T01:27:54.389Z -- unspecified -- ipxe
item.description: A vulnerability was found in iPXE. It has been declared as problematic. This vulnerability affects the function tls_new_ciphertext of the file src/net/tls.c of the component TLS. The manipulation of the argument pad_len leads to information exposure through discrepancy. The name of the patch is 186306d6199096b7a7c4b4574d4be8cdb8426729. It is recommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. VDB-214054 is the identifier assigned to this vulnerability.
